forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. North northwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco greets you with a luminous sun illuminating the skyline, casting gentle shadows across the streets. Temperatures hover around a comfortable sixty-three degrees, promising warmth a midst the chill that will follow as the day unfolds. The atmospheric embrace carries an unmistakable freshness, with a soft north-northeast breeze whispering sweet nothings at seven miles per hour. Look closely, and you'll notice a rare absence of fog blanketing the hills or the bay; the clarity presents an inviting spectacle of the Golden Gate Bridge and the sprawling city, unencumbered by the usual morning marine layer.

As the day wanes, expect the sun to gradually sink behind the horizon, allowing a soft twilight to settle in. The forecast hints at a cool drop to around forty-six degrees tonight amidst clear skies, providing a lovely contrast to the gentle warmth of the afternoon. A light layer, perhaps a cardigan, paired with comfortable footwear will serve you well as you embrace the open air of the city—ideal for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet sit at a cozy café, savoring a steaming cup of coffee while watching the fading light dance on the tranquil waters. With an inviting atmosphere enveloping the city, it's a wonderful day to explore the simple pleasures of San Francisco life.
